615,4616,4616,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Waajibnimada waqtiga falanqeynta ee cusub waxaa uu khuseeya codsiyada la sameynaayo 20.7.2018 ama wixii ka dambeeyay.,2923.0,"['Entity1: codsiyada, Entity2: waqtigaa falanqeynta ee cusub, Relation: description']"

616,4617,4617,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Waxaa waqtiga falanqeynta laga soo bilaabayaa marka codsiga loo gudbiyo booliska ama howl-wadeennada ilaalada xuduudaha.,2924.0,[]

617,4618,4618,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Codsiyadee ayuusan isbedelka sharcigaan khuseynin ama ku saabsanayn?,2925.0,[]

618,4619,4619,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Isbedelka sharcigaan ma khuseeyo codsiyadii la sameeyay kahor 20.7.2018, sidoo kale ma khuseeyo arimaha dib loogu celiyay maxkamadda maamulka.",2926.0,[]

620,4621,4621,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Codsiyadii la sameeyay kahor 20.7.2018, iyagu ma lahan arinkan ah mudada falanqeynta ugu badan ee 6-da bilood.",2928.0,"['Entity1: Codsiyadii, Entity2: ambience, Relation: description, Qualifier: la sameeyay kahor 20.7.2018', 'Entity1: mudada falanqeynta, Entity2: bilood, Relation: length, Qualifier: ugu badan ee 6-da']"

621,4622,4622,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Si kastaba codsiydaas waxaa isku mar lala falanqeyn doonaa kuwii la sameeyay 20.7.2018 iyo kadibba.,2929.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value']"

622,4623,4623,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Ma dhici kartaa in mudada falanqeynta ee codsiyadii la sameeyay 20.7.2018 kahor ama kadibba, ay qaadato in ka badan 6 bilood?",2930.0,"['Entity1: codsiyadii, Entity2: falanqeynta, Relation: length, Qualifier: kahor', 'Entity1: codsiyadii, Entity2: qaadato, Relation: requirement, Qualifier: ka badan 6 bilood', 'Entity1: codsiyadii, Entity2: la sameeyay, Relation: time, Qualifier: 20.7.2018']"

623,4624,4624,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Sida sharciga uu dhigaayo mudada falanqeyntu waa ay ka badan kartaa 6 bilood, marka ay jiraan xaaladaha hoos ku xusan:",2931.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value ', 'time period', 'description']"

624,4625,4625,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Goâaanka waa in lagu sameeyo 15 bilood gudahood, haddii",2932.0,[]

625,4626,4626,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,1) arinku uu yahay mid la xiriira suâaalo ku saabsan xaqiiqooyin adag ama arimo xagga sharciga ah;,2933.0,[]

626,4627,4627,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"2) in tiro aad u badan oo ah dadka u dhashay dalalka dunida saddexaad ama dadka jinsiyad laâaanta ah ay isku mar wada codsadaan sharciga badbaadinta caalamiga ah, sababtaas awgeed ayaa waxkaqbashada arinkaasi ay adag tahay in goâaan lagaga gaaro mudada lixda bilood gudaheed ah;",2934.0,[]

627,4628,4628,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"3) daahista waxaa si cad sabab ugu ah, in uu codsaduhu gacan ka geysan waayay ama saameyn ku yeelan waayay caddeynta codsigiisa.",2935.0,"['Entity1: daahista, Entity2: codsaduhu, Relation: done_by, Qualifier: gacan ka geysan', 'Entity1: daahista, Entity2: caddeynta codsigiisa, Relation: eligible_for, Qualifier: saameyn ku yeelan']"

628,4629,4629,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Goâaanka waa in lagu gaaraa 18 bilood gudahood, haddii loo baahdo in codsiga ku saabsan badbaadinta caalamiga ah la baaro waqti ka dheer intii loogu talagalay, si ku saleysan qaab nidaamsan oo ku saleysan sababka sidaas loogu baaraayo.",2936.0,[]

629,4630,4630,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Si kastaba goâaanka waa in lagu gaaraa ugu dambeyn 21 bilood, haddii dalka uu ka soo jeedo codsaduhu ay ka jirto xaalad aan la hubin, sababtaas awgeedna aan goâaanka lagu gaari karin xilligii loogu talagalay.",2937.0,[]

630,4631,4631,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Maxaa ay tahay in la sameeyo, haddii falanqeynta codsigii la sameeyay kahor 20.7.2018 ay qaadato muddo ka badan 6 bilood?",2938.0,"['Entity1: falanqeynta codsigii, Entity2: muddo, Relation: eligibility_for, Qualifier: ka badan 6 bilood']"

631,4632,4632,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Qofka macmiilka ah uma baahna in uu isagu la soo xiriiro Waaxda Socdaalka.,2939.0,[]

632,4633,4633,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Waaxda Socdaalka ayaa qofka macmiilka ah qoraal ahaan ku soo ogeysiineysa arinka ku saabsan daahista falanqeynta codsiga iyo waqtiga loo qabanaayo mudada ay qaadanayso qiyaas ahaan falanqeynta cusub.,2940.0,[]

633,4634,4634,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Ka warran haddii waqtiga qiyaas ahaanta loo qabtay falanqeynta codsigii la sameeyay kahor 20.7.2018 uu muaddadii loo qabtay dhaafo?,2941.0,[]

634,4635,4635,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,Macmiilka waxaa loogu sheegayaa wareysiga magangalyodoonka qiyaasta waqtiga falanqeynta codsiga uu qaadanaayo.,2942.0,[]

635,4636,4636,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Haddii mudadii qiyaasta waqtiga falanqeynta ee loogu sheegay markii wareysiga lala yeelanaayay ay dhaafto intii loo qabtay, waqtiga falanqeynta ee la sugaayo waxaad ka hubin kartaa aaladda sida ootamaatiga ah u tirineysa mudada falanqeynta (kÃ¤sittelyaikalaskuri) ee ku taalla qeybta hore ee bogagga internetka ee Waaxda Socdaalka: www.migri.fi.",2943.0,"['residence permit application', 'processing time calculator', 'processing time', 'wareysiga, aaladda, issued_by, website: www.migri.fi']"

636,4637,4637,https://migri.fi/en/su-aalaha-inta-badan-nalaga-soo-weydiiyo-waqtiga-ugu-badan-ee-uu-qaadan-karo-falanqeynta-codsiga-magangalyodoonka-qaxootinimo2,"Sidoo kale qareenka qofka macmiilka ah ama shaqaalaha xerada qaxootiga, haddii ay u baahdaan way la soo xiriiri karaan Waaxda Socdaalka.",2944.0,"['Qofka macmiilka ah ama shaqaalaha xerada qaxootiga, Waaxda Socdaalka, contact_info, None']"

637,4638,4638,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Frequently asked questions: Interviewing children,2945.0,"['Entity1: Interviewing children, Entity2: Frequently asked questions, Relation: description']"
638,4639,4639,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Why are children interviewed during the asylum process?,2946.0,[]

639,4640,4640,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Children have the right to be heard in decisions that affect them.,2947.0,"['Entity1: Children, Entity2: decisions, Relation: right, Qualifier Key: affect, Qualifier Value: them']"

640,4641,4641,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,It is in the best interests of a child that his or her opinion is taken into account when such decisions are made.,2948.0,"[""Entity1: child's opinion, Entity2: decision, Relation: taken into account, Qualifier: None""]"

641,4642,4642,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Another reason for interviewing children who apply for asylum together with their family is that the children may also have their own grounds for asylum.,2949.0,"['children, asylum, grounds for asylum, own: for the children']"

642,4643,4643,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Under the Aliens Act, the Finnish Immigration Service has an obligation to hear all children over the age of 12 before making a decision that affects them.",2950.0,"['Aliens Act, Finnish Immigration Service, obligation, age: over 12, children']"

643,4644,4644,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Even a younger child may be heard if the child is sufficiently mature to have his or her views taken into account.,2951.0,"['Entity1: younger child, Entity2: his/her views, Relation: consideration, Qualifier: maturity, Sufficient']"

644,4645,4645,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In addition, the agency has a principle of hearing all unaccompanied minor asylum seekers regardless of age.",2952.0,"['agency, unaccompanied minor asylum seekers, hearing, regardless of, age']"
645,4646,4646,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,What is the interview like?,2953.0,[]

646,4647,4647,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Interviews with children consist of free narrative, meaning that the child can give their own account.",2954.0,"['children, interviews, type, narrative: free']"

647,4648,4648,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In asylum matters, interview is the most important method to find out what a person has to say about their situation.",2955.0,"['interview, person, done_by, None', 'interview, situation, done_by, None']"

648,4649,4649,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Children are interviewed in the presence of their parents, and the parents can participate in the discussion.",2956.0,"['Entity1: Children, Entity2: parents, Relation: participant, Qualifier Key: discussion, Qualifier Value: involved']"

649,4650,4650,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In addition to the child and his or her parents, there is also an interpreter and a Finnish Immigration Service employee present at the interview.",2957.0,"['child, parents, where, interview, [interpreter, Finnish Immigration Service employee]']"

650,4651,4651,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The Finnish Immigration Service uses trained employees who are specialised in interviewing children.,2958.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, employees, specialized in interviewing, None', 'employees, children, specialized in interviewing, None']"

651,4652,4652,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Usually, the interview takes between one and two hours.",2959.0,"['interview, one hour, length, minimum value: one hour', 'interview, two hours, length, maximum value: two hours']"

652,4653,4653,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"To make the child feel safe, part of the interview time is used to get to know each other.",2960.0,"['child, interview time, None, None, None']"

653,4654,4654,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,What is meant by a childâs âbest interestsâ in the asylum process?,2961.0,"['Entity1: child, Entity2: asylum process, Relation: best interests']"

654,4655,4655,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The âbest interestsâ of a child is a principle of law that must always be followed when the Finnish Immigration Service makes decisions affecting children.,2962.0,[]

655,4656,4656,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The best interests of a child are assessed individually on a case-by-case basis.,2963.0,"['Entity1: best interests of a child, Relation: assessed, Entity2: case-by-case basis']"
656,4657,4657,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"When a decision is made, the overall situation of the child is taken into account.",2964.0,[]

657,4658,4658,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"This includes the childâs personal background, situation and needs.",2965.0,"[""Entity: child's personal background, Entity: situation, Entity: needs""]"

658,4659,4659,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"When a best interests assessment is made, several viewpoints are taken into account.",2966.0,"['best interests assessment, viewpoints, taken into account']"
659,4660,4660,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The primary criterion is security.,2967.0,[]

660,4661,4661,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,A childâs grounds for international protection may be stronger than an adultâs.,2968.0,"[""Entity1: child's grounds for international protection, Entity2: adult's grounds for international protection, Relation: comparison, Qualifier: strength""]"

661,4662,4662,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Children may also have their own grounds for asylum independently of their parents.,2969.0,"['Entity1: Children, Entity2: asylum, Relation: grounds for, Qualifier Key: independently of their parents']"

662,4663,4663,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,There are also forms of persecution that only affect children.,2970.0,"['entities: persecution, children; relation: affect', 'persecution, children, affect, None']"

663,4664,4664,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"All this, together with the security situation in the childâs home region, is taken into account in asylum decisions.",2971.0,"['security situation, asylum decisions, taken into account, None', 'child’s home region, asylum decisions, taken into account, None']"

664,4665,4665,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"When a childâs best interests are assessed, we take into account the childâs family ties and other close relationships as well as the childâs religious, linguistic and cultural background.",2972.0,"[""child's best interests, family ties, assessed, "", ""child's best interests, relationships, assessed, "", ""child's best interests, religious background, assessed, "", ""child's best interests, linguistic background, assessed, "", ""child's best interests, cultural background, assessed, ""]"
665,4666,4666,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Also any individual needs concerning, for instance, the childâs development or health are taken into account.",2973.0,[]
666,4667,4667,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,What does the law say about interviewing children?,2974.0,[]

667,4668,4668,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In Finland, provisions on interviewing minors are laid down in the Aliens Act (see section 6 of the Aliens Act).",2975.0,"['entities, Aliens Act, laid down in, provisions', 'section 6, Aliens Act, of, None']"

668,4669,4669,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"The Finnish Immigration Service has been conducting separate interviews with all co-applicants who have turned 12, and the agency will keep doing so even in the future.",2976.0,"['The Finnish Immigration Service, co-applicants, done_by, age: 12']"
669,4670,4670,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,That is a statutory duty.,2977.0,[]

670,4671,4671,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The agency has also interviewed younger co-applicants if it has been deemed necessary.,2978.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', 'agency, younger co-applicants, interviewed, deemed necessary']"

671,4672,4672,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Interviewing minors is and has been an important way of assessing what would be in a childâs best interests in his or her situation.,2979.0,"['minors, assessment, child, None', 'assessment, best interests, None, None', 'situation, best interests, None, None']"
672,4673,4673,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Children are always interviewed in accordance with their age and maturity.,2980.0,"['children, interview, NA, age and maturity']"
673,4674,4674,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,This is a statutory duty laid down in the Aliens Act.,2981.0,"['Aliens Act, None, definition of an object, None, None']"
674,4675,4675,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Why do you interview children whose parents have converted to Christianity?,2982.0,[]

675,4676,4676,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"If a child is a member of a religious community, it can affect the child's risk of facing persecution in his or her home country.",2983.0,"['child, religious community, affect, risk: high', 'child, home country, affect, risk: high']"

676,4677,4677,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,A personâs religion may constitute grounds for asylum.,2984.0,"[""person's religion, asylum"", 'grounds for', ""person's religion, asylum, grounds for""]"

677,4678,4678,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Conversion to Christianity may affect a child's daily life in Finland even when he or she is young.,2985.0,"['Entity1: child, Entity2: Christianity, Relation: affect, Qualifier: daily life in Finland']"

678,4679,4679,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"The child may, for instance, have participated in church activities.",2986.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', ""'child', 'church activities', 'participated', None""]"
679,4680,4680,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Naturally, children may be in risk of facing persecution because of other reasons as well.",2987.0,[]
680,4681,4681,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"Sometimes, however, these events may have affected the parents in their home country or a long time ago.",2988.0,[]

681,4682,4682,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In such cases, it may not be necessary to interview the children.",2989.0,"['since it talks about the necessity to interview children', 'children, necessity, None']"
682,4683,4683,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,What is a child able to tell about his or her situation?,2990.0,[]

683,4684,4684,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Interviewing a child is necessary if the matter in question affects the child and if the child can be assumed to have information about the matter.,2991.0,"['child, matter, affects, assumed: can have information']"

684,4685,4685,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"In the hearing, the child can be asked for instance about what it means to him or her to be a member of a Christian congregation and what the childâs own opinion about this is.",2992.0,"['Entity1: child, Entity2: Christian congregation, Relation: description, Qualifier Key: own opinion, Qualifier Value: to him or her']"

685,4686,4686,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The purpose of asking such questions is to gather additional information about how the child is in risk of persecution.,2993.0,['entities not found']
686,4687,4687,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"However, the aim is not to use the child's statement against the family.",2994.0,[]

687,4688,4688,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,A childâs statement alone cannot determine whether the family is granted asylum or not.,2995.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', ""child's statement, family, determines, None""]"
688,4689,4689,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,What if children say something that contradicts their parentsâ statement?,2997.0,[]

689,4690,4690,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,A childâs statement cannot be the only factor that determines the outcome of a familyâs asylum application.,2998.0,"[""Entity1: child's statement, Entity2: family's asylum application, Relation: cannot determine outcome, Qualifier: only factor""]"
690,4691,4691,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"If something exceptional comes up, the agency may later ask the parents about it separately.",2999.0,[]

691,4692,4692,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,The purpose of interviewing children is not to use their statements against the family.,3000.0,"['Entity1: interviewing children, Entity2: family, Relation: use of statements, Qualifier: not']"

692,4693,4693,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,"On the contrary, the aim of the hearing is to see whether the children have anything to add to their parentsâ statements.",3001.0,"[""children, parents, none, add to: their parents' statements""]"

693,4694,4694,https://migri.fi/en/interviewing-children,Children can even have their own grounds for international protection that have not come up before.,3002.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value ', 'no extraction possible']"

891,4892,4892,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"However, local register offices do not and never have handled registrations of an EU citizenâs right of residence.",3221.0,[]

892,4893,4893,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Up until 2017, registrations of an EU citizenâs right of residence were processed by the Police.",3222.0,"[""EU citizen, Police, processed by, registrations, an EU citizen's right of residence""]"

893,4894,4894,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The Police were also responsible for issuing certificates for an EU citizenâs right of residence up until 2017.,3223.0,"[""in the context of the relation 'issued_by'"", ""Police, EU citizen's right of residence, issued_by, until, 2017""]"

894,4895,4895,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Since 2017, the Finnish Immigration Service has handled these registrations and certificates.",3224.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, registrations and certificates, handling, date: 2017']"

895,4896,4896,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you have never registered your EU citizenâs right of residence with the police or with the Finnish Immigration Service, then contact the Finnish Immigration Service by email immediately to find out whether your right of residence has been registered.",3225.0,"['EU citizen’s right of residence, police, requirement, instruction, to contact the Finnish Immigration Service by email immediately', 'EU citizen’s right of residence, Finnish Immigration Service, requirement, instruction, to contact the Finnish Immigration Service by email immediately']"

896,4897,4897,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Then, apply for right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement from 1 October 2020 by a separate application.",3226.0,"['Entity1: right of permanent residence, Entity2: withdrawal agreement, Relation: application_for, Qualifier Key: from, Qualifier Value: 1 October 2020']"

897,4898,4898,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Some UK citizens who relocated to Finland before the entry into force of the current freedom of movement rules on 29 April 2004 may still have a residence permit issued pursuant to the Aliens Act, as at the time it was not converted to a certificate of the registration of an EU citizenâs right of residence.",3227.0,"['UK citizens, Finland, requirement, issued pursuant to, Aliens Act']"
898,4899,4899,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You may also have a permanent residence permit.,3228.0,"['permanent residence permit, None, None, None']"

899,4900,4900,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You may have a sticker in your passport to show that you have a permanent residence permit.,3229.0,"['because the sticker is used to describe something', 'passport, sticker, description, location: in passport', 'sticker, permanent residence permit, description, None']"
900,4901,4901,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The passport sticker was replaced with the residence permit card in 2012.,3230.0,"['passport sticker, residence permit card, replaced with, year: 2012']"

902,4903,4903,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Apply for changing your permanent residence permit into a right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement, free of charge.",3232.0,"['Entity1: permanent residence permit, Entity2: right of permanent residence, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: agreement, Qualifier Value: withdrawal, Qualifier Key: cost, Qualifier Value: free of charge']"

904,4905,4905,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,UK citizens who have not previously applied to register their EU citizenâs right of residence must apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement or right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement.,3234.0,"['entity1, entity2, relation, qualifier key: qualifier value', ""UK citizens, EU citizen's right of residence, requirement, None"", 'UK citizens, right of residence, requirement, withdrawal agreement', 'UK citizens, permanent residence, requirement, withdrawal agreement']"

905,4906,4906,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"For those who already have a certificate of permanent registration of an EU citizenâs right of residence, converting this to right of residence under the withdrawal agreement is free of charge.",3235.0,"[""certificate of permanent registration of an EU citizen's right of residence, right of residence under the withdrawal agreement, conversion, cost, free of charge""]"

906,4907,4907,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,An EU citizen who has resided legally in Finland for a continuous period of five years is entitled to right of permanent residence.,3236.0,"['Entity1: EU citizen, Entity2: right of permanent residence, Relation: entitled to, Qualifier Key: continuous period, Qualifier Value: five years']"

907,4908,4908,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Applying for a such a certificate is voluntary for EU citizens; they automatically have right of permanent residence even if they do not apply for the certificate if they fulfil the requirements for continuous and legal residence.,3237.0,[]

908,4909,4909,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Since the UK has left the European Union, UK citizens are no longer EU citizens, and the freedom of movement rules do not apply to them.",3238.0,"['UK citizens, European Union, citizenship, None', 'UK citizens, freedom of movement rules, citizenship, None']"

909,4910,4910,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you wish to continue to reside in Finland, you must apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement during the application period, 1 October 2020 to 30 September 2021.",3239.0,"['applying for right of residence, withdrawal agreement', 'applying for right of residence, Finland', 'applying for right of residence, 1 October 2020 - 30 September 2021']"

910,4911,4911,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you are temporarily living outside Finland, you can apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement while outside Finland.",3240.0,"['right of residence, withdrawal agreement, application_form, where: outside Finland']"

911,4912,4912,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"In this case, submit your application to a Finnish mission or an application centre of an external service provider.",3241.0,"['Entity1: application, Entity2: Finnish mission or application centre, Relation: where, Qualifier Key: provider, Qualifier Value: external service']"

912,4913,4913,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"For particularly weighty reasons, you may apply for right of residence even after the application period has ended.",3242.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: right of residence, Relation: requirement, Qualifier: application period has ended']"
913,4914,4914,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"In that case, you must justifiably explain why you were not able to apply for right of residence during the application period.",3243.0,[]

914,4915,4915,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"The Finnish Immigration Service will evaluate, on a case-by-case basis, whether your explanation for a delayed application for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement is acceptable.",3244.0,"['since the Finnish Immigration Service will evaluate the explanation for a delayed application', 'since the application for right of residence was delayed', 'Finnish Immigration Service, explanation, requirement, application_time:delayed', 'delayed application, right of residence, requirement, None']"

915,4916,4916,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You can apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement if you are permanently resident in Finland before the end of the transition period (31 December 2020) and continue to reside in Finland after the end of the transition period (1 January 2020).,3246.0,"['apply for right of residence, withdrawal agreement, requirement, citizenship: permanent resident ', 'Finland, withdrawal agreement, requirement, time period: before 31 December 2020 and after 1 January 2020']"

916,4917,4917,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you have already been issued a certificate of an EU citizenâs right of permanent residence, apply to change your certificate for a right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement, free of charge.",3247.0,"[""Entity1: certificate of an EU citizen's right of permanent residence, Entity2: right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement, Relation: application_form""]"

917,4918,4918,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You will then be issued with a residence permit card that proves your right of residence in Finland.,3248.0,"['residence permit card, right of residence, proves, None']"

918,4919,4919,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you are a UK citizen and you have registered your EU citizenâs right of residence in Finland, you and your family members will be legally resident in Finland during the application period, 1 October 2020 to 30 September 2021.",3249.0,"['UK citizen, Finland, country_of_citizenship, application_time: 1 October 2020 to 30 September 2021', ""EU citizen's right of residence, Finland, requirement, application_time: 1 October 2020 to 30 September 2021"", 'family members, Finland, eligibility, application_time: 1 October 2020 to 30 September 2021']"

919,4920,4920,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Your residence will be legal after the transition period until your right of residence under the withdrawal agreement is granted or until you have received a legally valid decision to your application.,3250.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', '""residence"", ""transition period"", ""legal status"", None', '""right of residence"", ""withdrawal agreement"", ""granted"", None', '""legally valid decision"", ""application"", ""received"", None']"

920,4921,4921,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"However, if you do not apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement by 30 September 2021, thereafter you will no longer be resident legally in Finland.",3251.0,"[""'you', 'right of residence', 'requirement', 'application_time: before 30 September 2021'"", ""'you', 'Finland', 'country_of_residence', 'legally'""]"

921,4922,4922,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Freedom of movement under EU rules as guaranteed by the withdrawal agreement will cease to apply to UK citizens and their family members when the transition period ends on 31 December 2020.,3252.0,"['EU rules, withdrawal agreement, cease to apply, when, on 31 December 2020', 'UK citizens, freedom of movement, cease to apply, when, on 31 December 2020']"

922,4923,4923,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"After the transition period, their residence in Finland is based not on freedom of movement but on right of residence granted on the basis of EU law, whether granted previously or applied for before the end of the transition period, or on right of residence under the withdrawal agreement.",3253.0,"['residence, Finland, location, None', 'residence, freedom of movement, basis, None', 'residence, right of residence granted on the basis of EU law, basis, None', 'residence, withdrawal agreement, basis, None', 'residence, EU law, granted on the basis of, None', 'residence, right of residence, basis, None', 'residence, transition period, end of, None']"

923,4924,4924,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"When you apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement, you will be given a certificate of your pending application.",3254.0,"['s', 'withdrawal agreement, right of residence, issued_by, None, certificate', 'apply, right of residence, issued_by, None, certificate', 'right of residence, certificate, issued_by, None, pending application']"

924,4925,4925,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"You will continue to be allowed to work, operate a business or study in Finland.",3255.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', 'work, Finland, None, None', 'operate a business, Finland, None, None', 'study, Finland, None, None']"

925,4926,4926,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Once right of residence under the withdrawal agreement is granted to a UK citizen, they and their family members do not need to reapply for right of residence if they change jobs, start a business, go from studying to employment, or go from employment to retirement.",3257.0,"['right of residence, withdrawal agreement, requirement, N/A']"

926,4927,4927,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"The right of residence under the withdrawal agreement includes the right to study, the right to work and the right to operate a business.",3258.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', 'right of residence, withdrawal agreement, include, None', 'withdrawal agreement, right to study, None, None', 'withdrawal agreement, right to work, None, None', 'withdrawal agreement, right to operate a business, None, None']"

927,4928,4928,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You can still apply for a Brexit permit if you have reasonable grounds to submit your application late.,3259.0,"['reasonable grounds, Brexit permit, requirement, application_time, late submission']"
928,4929,4929,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The Application Finder at Migri.fi helps you find the right application.,3260.0,"['Application Finder, Migri.fi, helps find']"

929,4930,4930,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Even when you submit your Brexit permit application late, your right to work or study will continue while your application is being processed.",3261.0,"['Entity1: Brexit permit application, Entity2: right to work/study, Relation: application_time, Qualifier: None', 'Entity1: Brexit permit application, Entity2: right to work/study, Relation: processing_time, Qualifier: being processed']"

930,4931,4931,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Extended permit is a fixed-term residence permit, which is often granted on the same grounds as your first permit or right of residence.",3262.0,"['Entity1: extended permit, Entity2: fixed-term residence permit, Relation: description']"
931,4932,4932,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Alternatively, you can apply for an extended permit on new grounds.",3263.0,[]
932,4933,4933,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Remember that you need to meet the requirements for the residence permit for which you apply.,3264.0,[]

933,4934,4934,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"An extended permit is issued according to national law, which means that when you apply for a residence permit you will not be granted a right of residence under the withdrawal agreement.",3266.0,"['residence permit, national law, issued_by, None', 'residence permit, right of residence, eligible_for, withdrawal agreement']"

934,4935,4935,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You cannot be granted a Brexit permit only on the grounds that your spouse is a Finnish citizen.,3267.0,"['since the sentence talks about the citizenship of the spouse', 'Brexit permit, spouse, country_of_citizenship']"

935,4936,4936,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You must meet one of the requirements for a right of residence under the withdrawal agreement.,3268.0,"['Entity1: requirements for a right of residence, Entity2: withdrawal agreement, Relation: meets, Qualifier: None']"

936,4937,4937,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"You have grounds for your residence in Finland, if you have moved to Finland prior to 1 January 2021 and you are",3269.0,"['Entity1: You, Entity2: Finland, Relation: residence, Qualifier Key: grounds, Qualifier Value: moving prior to 1 January 2021']"
937,4938,4938,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you fulfil one of the requirements mentioned above, apply for one of the following permits, depending on your situation:",3270.0,[]

938,4939,4939,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you do not fulfil any of the requirements for a right of residence under the withdrawal agreement, apply for a residence card for a family member of an EU citizen or a residence permit, depending on your situation.",3271.0,"['Entity1: withdrawal agreement, Entity2: right of residence, Relation: requirement', 'Entity1: residence card, Entity2: family member of an EU citizen, Relation: application_form', 'Entity1: residence permit, Entity2: situation, Relation: application']"

939,4940,4940,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"This means that your spouse has exercised his or her right of free movement, and therefore you can apply for a residence card for a family member of an EU citizen.",3272.0,"['Entity1: spouse, Entity2: residence card, Relation: application_form, Qualifier: family member of an EU citizen']"

940,4941,4941,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Read the instructions on how to apply on the page migri.fi/residence-card-for-family-members.,3273.0,"['Entity1: the page migri.fi/residence-card-for-family-members, Entity2: instructions, Relation: instructions, Qualifier: None']"

941,4942,4942,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Read the instructions on how to apply for a residence permit on the page migri.fi/residence-permit.,3274.0,"['residence permit, page migri.fi/residence-permit, instructions, None']"

943,4944,4944,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You must be permanently resident in Finland in order to be granted right of residence under the withdrawal agreement.,3277.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: Finland, Relation: country_of_residence, Qualifier Key: None, Qualifier Value: None', 'Entity1: right of residence, Entity2: withdrawal agreement, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: None, Qualifier Value: None']"

944,4945,4945,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Your right of residence may be revoked if you are temporarily absent from Finland for too long.,3278.0,"[""'right of residence', 'Finland', 'revoked', 'Qualifier Key: ', 'temporarily absent for too long'""]"

945,4946,4946,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Also, your period of residence in Finland must be continuous enough to gain you right of permanent residence.",3279.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value']"
946,4947,4947,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The following types of absence are allowed:,3280.0,[]

947,4948,4948,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"The rights granted under right of residence under the withdrawal agreement will be yours in perpetuity, unless you cease to fulfil the relevant requirements.",3281.0,"['Entity1: right of residence, Entity2: withdrawal agreement, Relation: granted under, Qualifier: in perpetuity', 'Entity1: you, Entity2: requirements, Relation: fulfil, Qualifier: relevant']"

948,4949,4949,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you reside continuously outside Finland for more than five years, your right of permanent residence will be revoked.",3282.0,"['you, right of permanent residence', 'revoked', 'length, more than five years', 'you, right of permanent residence, revoked, length: more than five years']"

949,4950,4950,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"The right of residence under the withdrawal agreement, including the right to employment, is only valid in Finland.",3283.0,"['right of residence, withdrawal agreement, Finland', 'validity', 'employment', 'right of residence, withdrawal agreement, validity, employment: True, location: Finland']"

950,4951,4951,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Freedom of movement will not apply to UK citizens after the transition period ends on 31 December 2020.,3284.0,"['UK citizens, freedom of movement, country_of_citizenship, None']"

951,4952,4952,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"You may freely move within the Schengen area by displaying a passport and your right of residence certificate for a maximum period of 90 days within any continuous period of 180 days, but you will no longer have the right pursuant to EU law or your right of residence under the withdrawal agreement to live and work in another EU Member State.",3285.0,"['Schengen area, passport, length, maximum period: 90 days', 'Schengen area, right of residence certificate, length, maximum period: 90 days', 'Schengen area, EU law, length, continuous period: 180 days', 'Schengen area, withdrawal agreement, length, continuous period: 180 days', 'Schengen area, EU Member State, length, continuous period: 180 days']"

952,4953,4953,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"After 1 January 2021, please consult the authorities of the country to which you wish to relocate concerning residence permits.",3286.0,"['Person, authorities', 'Country, relocation', 'residence permits, requirement', 'consult, concerning', 'consult, date', 'date, January 1 2021']"

953,4954,4954,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you fulfil the requirements for right of permanent residence, you may apply for right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement after the end of the transition period on 31 December 2020.",3287.0,[]

954,4955,4955,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you have not yet resided in Finland for five years by the end of the transition period, you can still accumulate this time after the end of the transition period and obtain your right of permanent residence later.",3288.0,"['Finland, time, accumulation, after, the end of the transition period', 'right of permanent residence, time, accumulation, after, the end of the transition period']"

955,4956,4956,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"In order for you to be granted the right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement, you must have had a legal basis for residing in Finland for a period of five years: you must have been an employee, self-employed person, family member or student while residing in Finland.",3289.0,"['legal basis for residing in Finland, right of permanent residence, requirement, requirement: period of five years', 'employee, right of permanent residence, requirement, requirement: period of five years', 'self-employed person, right of permanent residence, requirement, requirement: period of five years', 'family member, right of permanent residence, requirement, requirement: period of five years', 'student, right of permanent residence, requirement, requirement: period of five years']"

956,4957,4957,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If none of the above apply to you, then you are required to have had sufficient means to provide for yourself and your family members.",3290.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: sufficient means, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: None, Qualifier Value: None']"

957,4958,4958,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"There is no specific sum of money that you are required to have had, but you must have had enough to be able to live on your own funds.",3291.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value ', 'no entities found']"
958,4959,4959,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,This means that your livelihood has not been primarily based on income support or other similar benefits.,3292.0,[]
959,4960,4960,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,Individual circumstances will be considered in the assessment of the income level.,3293.0,[]

960,4961,4961,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"In order to gain the right of permanent residence under the withdrawal agreement, you must prove with documents that you have been legally residing in Finland for at least five years.",3294.0,"['you, right of permanent residence, requirement, length, at least five years ', 'required documents, right of permanent residence, requirement, length, at least five years ']"

961,4962,4962,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The grounds for your residence in Finland may have changed over the period of five years.,3295.0,"['Entity1: grounds, Entity2: residence in Finland, Relation: change, Qualifier: period of five years']"

962,4963,4963,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"For instructions on how to apply, visit migri.fi/application-for-right-of-permanent-residence.",3296.0,"['Entity1: instructions, Entity2: migri.fi/application-for-right-of-permanent-residence, Relation: description']"

963,4964,4964,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"In some cases, you may reside abroad temporarily without interrupting the accumulation of your period of continuous residence in Finland.",3297.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: period of continuous residence in Finland, Relation: interruption, Qualifier: no interruption']"

964,4965,4965,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,You are required to have had grounds for your residence in Finland for the entire duration of the five-year period.,3299.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: residence in Finland, Relation: requirement, Qualifier: length of time, Qualifier Value: entire duration of the five-year period']"

965,4966,4966,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Temporary absences do not impact the continuity of the five-year residence period if they do not exceed six months in any one year; nor does a longer absence for the completion of military service or one absence of no more than twelve months that is accounted to an important reason, such as pregnancy and childbirth, serious illness, academic studies or vocational training, or being posted to another EU country or a third country on a work-related assignment.",3300.0,"['temporary absences, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, six months in any one year', 'military service, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, longer absence', 'pregnancy and childbirth, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months', 'serious illness, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months', 'academic studies, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months', 'vocational training, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months', 'EU country, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months', 'third country, continuity of the five-year residence period, requirement, length, one absence of no more than twelve months']"
966,4967,4967,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"Depending on your specific situation, the time of your return to Finland may be relevant.",3301.0,[]

967,4968,4968,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"If you were permanently resident in Finland before 31 December 2020, you can return to Finland in April 2021 and apply then for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement.",3302.0,"['Finland, right of residence, requirement, being permanently resident in Finland before 31 December 2020', 'right of residence, withdrawal agreement, requirement', 'withdrawal agreement, right of residence, application_time, April 2021, done_by, the applicant']"

968,4969,4969,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"You may apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement until 30 September 2021, the end of the application period.",3303.0,"['right of residence, withdrawal agreement, application_time, date: 30 September 2021']"

969,4970,4970,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"By contrast, if you do not return to Finland until April 2021, you cannot apply for right of residence under the withdrawal agreement, because this would only be possible until the end of the transition period on 31 December 2020; instead, you must apply for a residence permit like any other third-country national.",3304.0,"['Entity1: you, Entity2: Finland, Relation: return, Qualifier Key: time, Qualifier Value: until April 2021', 'Entity1: right of residence, Entity2: withdrawal agreement, Relation: apply for', 'Entity1: you, Entity2: right of residence, Relation: eligibility, Qualifier Key: under, Qualifier Value: withdrawal agreement', 'Entity1: end, Entity2: transition period, Relation: time period, Qualifier Key: on, Qualifier Value: 31 December 2020', 'Entity1: you, Entity2: residence permit, Relation: apply for']"
970,4971,4971,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,The withdrawal agreement protects also frontier workers.,3306.0,"['frontier workers, withdrawal agreement, protection, None']"

971,4972,4972,https://migri.fi/en/brexit3,"A frontier worker works, or pursues activities as a self-employed person, in an EU Member State but lives in another EU Member State.",3307.0,"['frontier worker, EU Member State, works in, None', 'frontier worker, self-employed person, pursues activities as, None', 'frontier worker, another EU Member State, lives in, None']"

1715,5716,5716,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"If the employee's residence permit was granted on the basis on intra-corporate transfer, the permit only allows the employee to work in the service of the original employer.",4787.0,"[""employee's residence permit, intra-corporate transfer, original employer"", 'restricts to work for', 'basis of the permit']"

1717,5718,5718,https://migri.fi/en/employers,Many residence permits that are granted on grounds other than employment give an unrestricted right to work.,4789.0,"['residence permits, right to work, requirement, grounds: other than employment']"

1720,5721,5721,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"Read more about changing jobs on the page Changing jobs, and about checking an employee's right to work in the section Verifying your employeeâs right to work.",4792.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value', '""Changing jobs"", page, description,', '""verifying employee\'s right to work"", section, description,']"

1724,5725,5725,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"In general, an employee cannot start working before he or she has received a decision.",4796.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value']"

1726,5727,5727,https://migri.fi/en/employers,Employees working in the following positions can start working before receiving a decision:,4798.0,[]

1727,5728,5728,https://migri.fi/en/employers,Read more about starting to work before receiving a decision on the page Right to work without a residence permit.,4799.0,"['right to work, residence permit, requirement, none']"

1728,5729,5729,https://migri.fi/en/employers,You will find information on the right to work without a residence permit for 90 days on the page Right to work without a residence permit.,4800.0,"['page, Right to work without a residence permit, None, None, None']"

1729,5730,5730,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"In general, a residence permit granted by another EU Member State or Schengen State does not give an employee the right to work in Finland.",4801.0,"['Entity1: residence permit, Entity2: employee, Relation: right to work, Qualifier: EU Member State/Schengen State']"

1731,5732,5732,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"An exception to the rule are permanent employees of a company that operates in another EU/EEA country, who come to Finland to perform temporary acquisition or subcontracting tasks, as specified in the regulations concerning the freedom to provide services, in the service of the same employer and for a maximum of six months.",4803.0,"['""description""', '""done_by""', '""length""', 'permanent employees, company, employment, ', 'EU/EEA country, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, activity, ', 'Finland, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, where, ', 'permanent employees, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, eligible_for, ', 'regulations concerning the freedom to provide services, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, description, ', 'same employer, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, done_by, ', 'six months, temporary acquisition/subcontracting tasks, length, maximum of']"

1732,5733,5733,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"Furthermore, the employees must also have permits that allow them to reside and work in said country, and these permits must still be valid when they finish their work in Finland.",4804.0,"['Entity1: employees, Entity2: permits, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: permission to reside and work, Qualifier Value: in said country', 'Entity1: permits, Entity2: residence, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: validity, Qualifier Value: when finishing work in Finland']"

1733,5734,5734,https://migri.fi/en/employers,A posted worker may work in Finland without a residence permit granted by Finland for a maximum of 90 days.,4805.0,"['posted worker, residence permit, requirement, length: maximum of 90 days']"

1734,5735,5735,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"In addition, a person with an intra-corporate transferee permit (âICT permitâ) may work in Finland on secondment for a maximum of 90 days.",4806.0,"['ICT permit', 'ICT permit, Finland, length, maximum of 90 days']"

1738,5739,5739,https://migri.fi/en/employers,"If the employee has a permanent residence permit, his or her right to work does not end even if the residence permit card has expired.",4810.0,"['permanent residence permit, right to work, eligibility, duration, even if the residence permit card has expired']"

1893,5894,5894,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"If you have applied for asylum or temporary protection in Finland, you will be offered accommodation at a reception centre.",5056.0,"['asylum/temporary protection, reception centre', 'reception centre, Finland', 'asylum, reception centre, offered at', 'temporary protection, reception centre, offered at', 'reception centre, Finland, country_of_residence']"
1894,5895,5895,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"The place where you will stay will depend on your age, gender and other circumstances.",5057.0,"['age, gender, where, circumstances']"

1895,5896,5896,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"You can live at the reception centre together with your closest family members, such as your spouse or your children who are under the age of 18.",5058.0,"['""you"", ""reception centre"", ""live"", None', '""closest family members"", ""you"", ""live with"", None', '""children"", ""age of 18"", ""under"", None']"

1896,5897,5897,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,Persons under the age of 18 who arrive in Finland without a parent or guardian will stay at a unit for minors.,5059.0,"['Persons under the age of 18, Finland, where, None', 'Persons under the age of 18, Unit for minors, where, None']"

1897,5898,5898,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,You may not be able to always stay in the same reception centre.,5060.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, relation, [Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value] ']"

1898,5899,5899,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"You and your family may be transferred to another reception centre if this is necessary because of your personal situation, reception centre operations or the processing of your asylum application.",5061.0,"['you and your family, reception centre, transferred, necessary: because of personal situation, reception centre operations or the processing of your asylum application']"

1899,5900,5900,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,The first place where asylum seekers and those who apply for temporary protection usually stay is called a transit centre.,5062.0,"['transit centre, asylum seekers, eligible_for, ', 'transit centre, those who apply for temporary protection, eligible_for, ']"
1900,5901,5901,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,Transit centres are meant for short-term accommodation.,5063.0,"['Transit centres, short-term accommodation', 'None', 'None']"

1901,5902,5902,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,You will be transferred from the transit centre to another reception centre where you can stay for a longer period.,5064.0,"['reception centre, transit centre, done_by', 'reception centre, longer period, length']"

1902,5903,5903,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,There are many reception centres of different types and sizes in different parts of Finland.,5065.0,"['reception centres, Finland, located in, None']"

1903,5904,5904,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,It is not possible to choose the reception centre where you will be staying.,5066.0,"['Entity1: reception centre, Entity2: staying, Relation: where, Qualifier: None']"

1905,5906,5906,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"Reception centres are maintained by many operators: the Finnish Immigration Service, Finnish municipalities, organisations and companies.",5068.0,"['Reception centres, Finnish Immigration Service, maintained by', 'Reception centres, Finnish municipalities, maintained by', 'Reception centres, organisations, maintained by', 'Reception centres, companies, maintained by']"

1906,5907,5907,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"All reception centres offer the same reception services to the people who live there, and all reception centres operate according to the same principles.",5069.0,"['reception centres, reception services, services, -', 'reception centres, people, services, -', 'reception centres, principles, where, -']"

1907,5908,5908,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,"The Finnish Immigration Service directs, plans and supervises the practical operations of all reception centres.",5070.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, reception centres, services, None']"

1908,5909,5909,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-a-reception-centre,The reception of asylum seekers is steered by the Finnish Act on the Reception of Persons Applying for International Protection (finlex.fi).,5071.0,"['Finnish Act on the Reception of Persons Applying for International Protection, finlex.fi, steered by']"

1911,5912,5912,https://migri.fi/en/living-in-private-accommodation,"Your reception centre will give you the reception services that belong to you, such as health care services and a reception allowance.",5075.0,"['Entity1: reception centre, Entity2: reception services, Relation: services, Qualifier: health care services and a reception allowance']"

2502,6503,6503,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,We take advantage of automation in decision-making and in the processing of applications.,6624.0,"['automation, decision-making, None, None, None', 'automation, processing, None, None, None', 'applications, processing, None, None, None']"

2503,6504,6504,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"For example, applications are automatically directed to different processing paths, which makes the processing more efficient and improves customer service.",6625.0,"['Entity1: applications, Entity2: processing paths, Relation: directed to, Qualifier: N/A']"

2505,6506,6506,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,Automated decision-making does not use artificial intelligence.,6630.0,[]

2506,6507,6507,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,So-called assistive automation has been in use at the Finnish Immigration Service for several years.,6631.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, assistive automation, None, Several years']"

2507,6508,6508,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,Assistive automation means that a set of automated rules has been established to help officials verify that an application meets the necessary requirements applicable to the permit in question.,6632.0,"['assistive automation, officials, verification, applicable to the permit in question']"

2509,6510,6510,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"If discretion must be exercised, the requirement is directed to our specialist for examination.",6634.0,[]

2510,6511,6511,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"Once all the requirements for the application have been met, a draft decision is automatically generated.",6635.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value']"
2511,6512,6512,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,The draft decision is then validated by our specialist.,6636.0,"['draft decision, specialist, validation']"

2512,6513,6513,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"Even though this type of assistive automation has been in use for several years, introducing fully automated decisions has not previously been possible due to a lack of general legislation on the matter.",6637.0,"['this type of assistive automation, legislation, lack of, general: ']"

2513,6514,6514,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"Now that the current legislation allows automated decisions, the Finnish Immigration Service will gradually start identifying standard cases in different permit processes in which automated decisions could be issued.",6638.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, permit processes, automated decisions could be issued, standard cases: in different permit processes']"

2515,6516,6516,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,We started using automated decision-making in October 2023.,6640.0,['entities: automated decision-making; relation: started using; date: October 2023']
2516,6517,6517,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"At the moment, you may be granted an automated decision on the following applications in specific cases:",6641.0,[]
2517,6518,6518,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,We introduce automated decisions in stages.,6642.0,[]

2518,6519,6519,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"We first start using automated decision-making in the case of degree students at universities and exchange students in all educational institutions, because their applications rarely require individual assessment.",6643.0,"['degree students, universities, application, individual assessment: rarely', 'exchange students, educational institutions, application, individual assessment: rarely']"
2519,6520,6520,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,We aim to expand the use of automated decision-making to other standard cases among studentsâ applications.,6644.0,[]

2520,6521,6521,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,University students account for approximately 25 % of all students annually coming to Finland.,6645.0,"['University students, Finland, target_group, annually coming: all students to Finland per year']"

2521,6522,6522,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"When some of the students receive an automated decision, our specialists can focus their time on the processing of other applications.",6646.0,"['students, automated decision, focus their time on the processing of, None', 'specialists, applications, focus their time on the processing of, None']"
2522,6523,6523,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"This way, automated decisions will shorten the processing times of applications from other students as well.",6647.0,[]

2523,6524,6524,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"Under law, family members cannot receive an automated decision.",6648.0,"['Entity1: family members, Entity2: automated decision, Relation: cannot receive, Qualifier: None']"
2524,6525,6525,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"Therefore, automated decisions are not given to the applicants who apply for a permit at the same time as their family members.",6649.0,[]

2525,6526,6526,https://migri.fi/en/faq-automation,"However, we take account of the family members who are applying for a permit at the same time as the main applicant and try to issue decisions for them at the same time.",6650.0,"['Entity1: family members, Entity2: permit, Relation: application/issuance, Qualifier: same time']"

2557,6558,6558,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,You may be granted a residence permit only if you are able to travel to Finland and stay in the country legally.,6684.0,"['Entity1: residence permit, Entity2: Finland, Relation: requirement, Qualifier: [travel, legally]']"

2558,6559,6559,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,This means that you need a passport or other travel document with which you can travel to Finland and which is valid for the entire duration of the residence permit.,6685.0,"['passport, travel document, requirement, country of destination: Finland', 'passport, residence permit, requirement, validity: entire duration']"

2559,6560,6560,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Travel documents include passports, alien's passports, and refugee travel documents.",6686.0,"['passport, None, type of document, None', ""alien's passport, None, type of document, None"", 'refugee travel document, None, type of document, None']"
2560,6561,6561,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Your parent or guardian does not need to meet the income requirement, if:",6687.0,[]

2561,6562,6562,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Your parent or guardian is required to have sufficient financial resources from other sources than benefits paid by the society, if:",6688.0,"['Entity1: parent or guardian, Entity2: financial resources, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: source, Qualifier Value: other than benefits paid by the society']"
2562,6563,6563,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"In addition, your parent or guardian must have sufficient financial resources, if:",6689.0,[]

2563,6564,6564,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,An exemption may be made from the income requirement if there are exceptionally serious grounds for such an exemption or if it is in the best interest of the child.,6690.0,"['income requirement, exemption, requirement, exemption reason: exceptionally serious grounds or best interest of the child']"

2564,6565,6565,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If you think that your parent or guardian should not be required to have sufficient financial resources, you can attach to the application a free-form written statement of the reasons why an exemption should be made.",6691.0,"['Entity1: parent or guardian, Entity2: financial resources, Relation: requirement, Qualifier Key: exemption, Qualifier Value: written statement']"
2565,6566,6566,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,A sister or brother who resides abroad is not required to have sufficient financial resources if the following conditions are met:,6692.0,[]

2566,6567,6567,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,You can apply for asylum in Finland only by visiting the police or a border control authority in person in Finland.,6694.0,"['asylum, Finland, apply_for, application_method: in person in Finland', 'police, asylum, apply_for, application_method: in person in Finland', 'border control authority, asylum, apply_for, application_method: in person in Finland']"

2567,6568,6568,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,There is no application form that you can fill in to apply for asylum in advance.,6695.0,"['Entity1: application form, Entity2: apply for asylum, Relation: none, Qualifier: none']"

2568,6569,6569,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"You cannot apply for asylum, for example, by sending a letter or an email to the Finnish Immigration Service.",6696.0,"['Asylum application, Letter/Email/Finnish Immigration Service, application form, Form: Not possible to apply for asylum by sending a letter or email']"
2569,6570,6570,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"For more information, see Asylum in Finland.",6698.0,[]

2570,6571,6571,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"When processing your application, we assess whether you may be granted asylum, subsidiary protection status, or an other residence permit.",6699.0,"['application, asylum, assessment, None', 'application, subsidiary protection status, assessment, None', 'application, residence permit, assessment, None']"

2571,6572,6572,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,We will make a positive decision on your asylum application if sufficient grounds for granting the permit exist.,6700.0,"['Entity1: asylum application, Entity2: permit, Relation: decision, Qualifier: sufficient grounds for granting the permit exist']"

2572,6573,6573,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Finnish Immigration Service always uses up-to-date country information when making decisions.,6701.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, country information, description']"

2573,6574,6574,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"The availability of this information, which is necessary in the decision-making process, is affected by the changes in the security situation in Afghanistan.",6702.0,"['information, decision-making process, affected by, None', 'security situation, Afghanistan, affected by, None']"

2574,6575,6575,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Talibanâs rise to power in August 2021 and the changes in Afghanistanâs administrative circumstances and security situation have had a considerable impact on the availability of country information.,6703.0,"['Taliban, August 2021, rise to power, impact, considerable', 'Afghanistan, availability of country information, changed by, null, null']"

2575,6576,6576,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"For this reason, the Finnish Immigration Service decided earlier to temporarily suspend the decision-making on applications from Afghan customers.",6704.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, Afghan customers, decision-making on, applications']"

2576,6577,6577,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Now that there is a sufficient amount of current country information on how the situation looks like in different parts of Afghanistan, the Finnish Immigration Service can continue issuing decisions as usual.",6705.0,"['None, Finnish Immigration Service, issued_by, contact_info, unavailable']"

2577,6578,6578,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Finnish Immigration Service has issued new guidelines for decision-making regarding asylum and residence permit applications from Afghans.,6706.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, guidelines, issued by, No Qualifiers', 'decision-making, asylum and residence permit applications, regarding, from Afghans']"

2578,6579,6579,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The situation in Afghanistan does not affect the processing time of your asylum application.,6707.0,"['Afghanistan, processing time, None, None, None', 'asylum application, processing time, None, None, None']"

2579,6580,6580,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"For more information about the processing times of asylum applications, see Waiting for the decision.",6708.0,"['""processing times"", ""asylum applications"", ""description"", None']"

2580,6581,6581,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,We aim to issue decisions first for those asylum seekers who have been waiting the longest.,6709.0,"['Entity1: asylum seekers, Entity2: decisions, Relation: issued_by, Qualifier: None']"

2581,6582,6582,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"For more information about processing times of asylum applications, see Waiting for the decision.",6710.0,"['waiting for the decision, asylum application, processing_time']"

2582,6583,6583,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"At the moment, Finland is returning Afghans to Afghanistan only in exceptional cases.",6711.0,"['Finland, Afghans, None, None, None', 'Afghanis, Afghanistan, None, None, None']"
2583,6584,6584,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The decision you received tells you whether you can appeal against it.,6713.0,"['indicating possibility', 'decision, you, appeal, can']"
2584,6585,6585,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"In most cases, it is possible to appeal against a decision on an asylum application.",6714.0,"['decision, asylum application, appeal']"

2585,6586,6586,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If appealing against the decision is possible in your case, the decision you receive is accompanied by appeal instructions.",6715.0,"['Decision, Appeal instructions, instructions, appeal: possible']"

2586,6587,6587,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"The instructions specify the Administrative Court to which you may appeal, the appeal period, the attachments needed, and the ways you may submit your appeal to the Administrative Court.",6716.0,"['appeal, Administrative Court, appeal_to, None', 'appeal, appeal period, appeal_period, None', 'appeal, attachments, attachments_needed, None', 'appeal, ways, submit_to, None']"

2587,6588,6588,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,You can appeal against a decision while the appeal period is ongoing.,6717.0,"['Entity1: decision, Entity2: appeal, Relation: ability, Qualifier Key: when, Qualifier Value: appeal period is ongoing']"

2588,6589,6589,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Once the appeal period expires and the decision becomes final, you can no longer appeal against it.",6718.0,"['appeal period, decision, appeal, period expires']"

2589,6590,6590,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If you have received a final decision on your application, you may submit a subsequent application.",6719.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, Relation, Qualifier Key: Qualifier Value ']"
2590,6591,6591,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If your previous decision can still be appealed, the decision is not final.",6720.0,"['previous decision, decision, final, None']"

2591,6592,6592,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,Subsequent applications must be submitted as soon as there are grounds or need for applying again.,6721.0,"['subsequent applications, grounds, application_time, None', 'subsequent applications, need, application_time, None']"

2592,6593,6593,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,Subsequent applications are submitted to the police or the border control authorities.,6722.0,['entities and relations cannot be identified in the given sentence']

2593,6594,6594,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Administrative Court makes a decision on your appeal.,6723.0,"['Administrative Court, decision, ', 'decision, appeal, outcome, ', 'Administrative Court, decision, outcome, appeal']"

2594,6595,6595,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If you have any questions about the processing of your appeal, contact your legal counsel.",6724.0,"['Entity1: appeal processing, Entity2: legal counsel, Relation: contact_info']"

2595,6596,6596,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Please direct your questions to the instance which is currently processing your appeal, such as an administrative court or the Supreme Administrative Court.",6725.0,[]

2596,6597,6597,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The administrative courts are aware of the Finnish Immigration Serviceâs new guidelines.,6726.0,"[""administrative courts, Finnish Immigration Service's new guidelines, awareness, None""]"

2597,6598,6598,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If the updated guidelines will affect the decision, the administrative court will return your application to the Finnish Immigration Service for renewed consideration.",6727.0,"['administrative court, application, return, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, consideration, renewed, None', 'guidelines, decision, affect, updated']"
2598,6599,6599,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If you have already received a final decision, you can apply for asylum again.",6728.0,[]

2599,6600,6600,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Administrative Court may have amended the decision of the Finnish Immigration Service or ordered the Finnish Immigration Service to consider the matter again.,6729.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, Administrative Court, amendment, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, matter, consider again, None']"

2600,6601,6601,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If the Administrative Court has decided that the permit must be granted, the Finnish Immigration Service will issue you with the permit.",6730.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, permit, issued_by, If Administrative Court has decided the permit must be granted']"

2601,6602,6602,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Finnish Immigration Service may also request leave to appeal in respect of the Administrative Courtâs decision from the Supreme Administrative Court.,6731.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, Administrative Court, requirement, request leave to appeal: yes', 'Administrative Court, Supreme Administrative Court, requirement, None']"

2602,6603,6603,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If the Administrative Court has returned the matter for renewed consideration, the Finnish Immigration Service reviews your matter in order to determine whether sufficient grounds exist to grant you asylum, subsidiary protection status, or an other residence permit in Finland.",6732.0,"['Administrative Court, matter, return, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, matter, review, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, Asylum, grant, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, Subsidiary protection status, grant, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, Residence permit, grant, None', 'Finnish Immigration Service, Finland, grant, None']"

2603,6604,6604,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"You may be invited to a new asylum interview, if the Finnish Immigration Service needs further information to make a decision in your matter.",6733.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, asylum interview, eligibility, further information needed to make a decision']"

2604,6605,6605,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,The Finnish Immigration Service will observe the updated guidelines when it issues a decision.,6734.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, updated guidelines, issued_by, ']"

2605,6606,6606,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"The Talibanâs rise to power in August 2021 and the changes in Afghanistanâs administrative circumstances and security situation had a considerable impact on the availability of country information, which affected the processing times of applications.",6735.0,"['Taliban, Afghanistan, impact, availability: country information', 'security situation, availability, impact, None', 'country information, processing times, impact, None', 'applications, processing times, impact, None']"

2606,6607,6607,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"However, the Finnish Immigration Service has now obtained a sufficient amount of current country information regarding the different parts of Afghanistan.",6736.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, Afghanistan, country_of_origin, current information']"

2607,6608,6608,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"If you have not yet receive a decision from the Finnish Immigration Service on your application, you will receive a decision in the next few months.",6737.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, application, issued_by']"

2609,6610,6610,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,Your reception centre can then contact the police department that issued the notification.,6739.0,"['Entity1: reception centre, Entity2: police department, Relation: contact, Qualifier: issued the notification']"

2611,6612,6612,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"After that, your reception services will continue.",6741.0,[]

2612,6613,6613,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"Alternatively, the director of the reception centre can decide that you can be provided with reception services for a reasonable period for a special personal reason.",6742.0,"['director, reception services, services, provided by, reception centre', 'reception services, period, services, for, reasonable period', 'reception services, personal reason, services, for, special personal reason']"
2613,6614,6614,https://migri.fi/en/faq-afghanistan,"For the time being, assisted voluntary return to Afghanistan cannot be arranged.",6744.0,"['assisted voluntary return, Afghanistan, arrangement']"

2624,6625,6625,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"On 28 September 2023, the Council of the European Union decided to extend the temporary protection mechanism until 4 March 2025.",6759.0,"['Entity1: Council of the European Union, Entity2: temporary protection mechanism, Relation: extension, Qualifier Key: Date, Qualifier Value: 28 September 2023 - 4 March 2025']"
