2633,6634,6634,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,It currently takes about two weeks for residence permit cards to be ready.,6770.0,"['residence permit cards, two weeks, processing_time']"

2634,6635,6635,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,This means that you will receive a copy of the decision and your residence permit card approximately one month from the date on which you submit your application.,6771.0,"['decision, residence permit card, None', 'issued_by, organization responsible for issuing the document, None', 'processing_time, one month from the date of submission, None', 'decision, residence permit card, issued_by, processing_time: one month from the date of submission']"

2635,6636,6636,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"Applications are processed at an increasingly fast rate, however, and future applicants can receive a decision in less than a week.",6772.0,"['Entity1, Entity2, processing_time, required time, less than a week']"

2636,6637,6637,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"According to current information, residence permit cards will continue to require about two weeks to be available.",6773.0,"['Entity1: residence permit cards, Entity2: time, Relation: requirement, Qualifier: processing_time: about two weeks']"

2637,6638,6638,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"If you are fleeing the war in Ukraine, we recommend that you apply for temporary protection, which is intended to quickly offer you protection on a temporary basis.",6774.0,"['Ukraine, temporary protection, apply for, intended to, quickly offer you protection on a temporary basis']"

2638,6639,6639,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"The possibility to apply for asylum is intended for situations where you have a fear of being personally persecuted in your home country or country of permanent residence for reasons of ethnic origin, religion, nationality, membership in a particular social group or political opinion and cannot avail yourself of the protection of your home country or country of permanent residence.",6775.0,"['apply for asylum, fear of being persecuted', 'fear of being persecuted, ethnic origin', 'fear of being persecuted, religion', 'fear of being persecuted, nationality', 'fear of being persecuted, membership in a social group', 'fear of being persecuted, political opinion', 'home country, fear of being persecuted', 'permanent residence, fear of being persecuted']"
2639,6640,6640,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"Further information: If you have fled the war in Ukraine, it is advisable to apply for temporary protection (pdf).",6776.0,[]

2640,6641,6641,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,It is recommended that you apply for temporary protection even if you have already applied for asylum.,6778.0,"['temporary protection, asylum, application_form, None']"

2641,6642,6642,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,Temporary protection is a form of protection intended for people fleeing the war in Ukraine or for people who are unable to return to Ukraine because of the war.,6779.0,"['temporary protection, people fleeing war in Ukraine, target_group,', 'temporary protection, people unable to return to Ukraine because of war, target_group,']"
2642,6643,6643,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,An application for temporary protection is free of charge.,6780.0,"['application for temporary protection, -, cost, free of charge']"

2643,6644,6644,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,The Finnish Immigration Service is able to decide applications for temporary protection considerably more quickly than asylum applications.,6781.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, applications for temporary protection, processing_time, None', 'asylum applications, applications for temporary protection, processing_time, considerably more quickly']"

2644,6645,6645,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,The Finnish Immigration Service will suspend the processing of your asylum application for as long as your residence permit issued on the basis of temporary protection is valid.,6782.0,"['Finnish Immigration Service, asylum application, requirement, issued on the basis of, temporary protection', 'residence permit, asylum application, requirement, issued on the basis of, temporary protection']"
2645,6646,6646,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"For instructions on applying, see our temporary protection page.",6783.0,"['temporary protection page, instructions, instructions, applying']"
2646,6647,6647,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"Yes, you can, if you",6784.0,[]

2652,6653,6653,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"If you are a Ukrainian citizen and hold a biometric passport, you can stay in the Schengen area visa-free for up to 90 days.",6791.0,"['Ukrainian citizen, Schengen area, country_of_citizenship, length, up to 90 days']"

2653,6654,6654,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"If you plan to stay in Finland after this period is over, you must apply for a residence permit.",6792.0,"['you, Finland, residence permit', 'requirement', 'application_time: after this period is over', 'you, residence permit, requirement, application_time, after this period is over']"

2654,6655,6655,https://migri.fi/en/faq-ukraine,"If you come from a country that is subject to a visa requirement, you must have a valid visa, a residence permit or a pending residence permit application in order for your residence in Finland to be legal.",6793.0,"['country, visa requirement, subject to, None', 'country, Finland, reside in, legal', 'visa, residence permit, requirement, None']"

3504,7505,7505,https://migri.fi/en/emn/en,"The EMNâs objective is to support policy-making in the EU by providing up-to-date, objective, reliable and comparable information on migration and asylum.",7905.0,"['EMN, policy-making, support, None']"

3508,7509,7509,https://migri.fi/en/emn/en,"The EMNâs main products are annual reports on the development of immigration policy in the EU Member States and bodies, and various thematic studies on topical migration issues.",7910.0,"['EMN, annual report, main product, None', 'Entity1, development of immigration policy, described in, None', 'Entity1, EU Member States and bodies, described in, None', 'thematic studies, topical migration issues, covers, None']"

3512,7513,7513,https://migri.fi/en/emn/en,"In addition to reviews, studies and reports, the contact points may send each other ad hoc queries on topics related to immigration.",7914.0,"['Entity1: reviews, Entity2: studies, Relation: NA, Qualifier: NA', 'Entity1: reports, Entity2: studies, Relation: NA, Qualifier: NA', 'Entity1: contact points, Entity2: ad hoc queries, Relation: NA, Qualifier: topics related to immigration']"
